mapper.insert: insert into resume(resume_title, employee_id, resume_image, highschool_name, highschool_startdate, highschool_enddate, highschool_major, univ_name, univ_startdate, univ_enddate, univ_major, univ_grades, prev_co, career_period, career_position, career_department, career_task, job_id, is_main, created_at) VALUES(#{resumeTitle}, #{employeeId}, #{resumeImage}, #{highschoolName}, #{highschoolStartdate}, #{highschoolEnddate}, #{highschoolMajor}, #{univName}, #{univStartdate}, #{univEnddate}, #{univMajor}, #{univGrades}, #{prevCo}, #{careerPeriod}, #{careerPosition}, #{careerDepartment}, #{careerTask}, #{jobId}, false, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT e.employee_name, r.resume_title, r.career_period, j.job_name FROM resume r JOIN employee e ON r.employee_id=e.employee_id JOIN job j ON r.job_id=j.job_id ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

SELECT e.employee_title, r.resume_name, r.career_period, j.job_name FROM resume r JOIN employee e ON r.employee_id=e.employee_id JOIN job j ON r.job_id=j.job_id WHERE j.job_code = #{jobCode} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

SELECT r.resume_id, r.resume_title, r.employee_id, r.resume_image, r.highschool_name, r.highschool_startdate, r.highschool_enddate, r.highschool_major, r.univ_name, r.univ_startdate, r.univ_enddate, r.univ_major, r.univ_grades, r.prev_co, r.career_period, r.career_position, r.career_department, r.career_task, r.job_id, r.is_main, r.created_at, e.employee_name employee_name, e.employee_birth employee_birth, e.employee_sex employee_sex, e.employee_email employee_email, e.employee_tel employee_tel, e.employee_location employee_location FROM resume r LEFT OUTER JOIN employee e ON r.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE resume_id = #{resumeId}
SELECT * FROM resume r INNER JOIN job j ON r.job_id = j.job_id WHERE employee_id=#{employeeId};
mapper.update: UPDATE resume SET resume_title = #{resumeTitle}, resume_image = #{resumeImage}, highschool_name = #{highschoolName}, highschool_startdate = #{highschoolStartdate}, highschool_enddate = #{highschoolEnddate}, highschool_major = #{highschoolMajor}, univ_name = #{univName}, univ_startdate = #{univStartdate}, univ_enddate = #{univEnddate}, univ_major = #{univMajor}, univ_grades = #{univGrades}, prev_co = #{prevCo}, career_period = #{careerPeriod}, career_position = #{careerPosition}, career_department = #{careerDepartment}, career_task = #{careerTask}, job_id = #{jobId} WHERE resume_id = #{resumeId}
UPDATE resume SET is_main = case when resume_id=#{resumeId} then 1 ELSE 0 END WHERE employee_id = (select employee_id from resume WHERE resume_id=#{resumeId})
